snippet: The Federal Trade Commission announced its first mobile cramming case, accusing a company of taking advantage of consumers by tacking unwarranted charges onto their phone bills.
abstract: Federal Trade Commission announces its first mobile cramming case, accusing Wise Media and two of its owners of taking advantage of consumers by tacking unwarranted charges onto their mobile phone bills.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission announced its first mobile cramming case, accusing a company of taking advantage of consumers by tacking unwarranted charges onto their phone bills.

headline.seo: F.T.C. Takes Aim at Unwarranted Cellphone Charges
headline.main: U.S. Accuses Company of Adding Mobile Fees
headline.print_headline: U.S. Accuses Company Of Adding Mobile Fees
